actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize certain filling and construction in a portion of Upper New York Bay, Hudson County, N.J.

summary.text: Authorizes the filling and construction in a specified portion of Upper New York Bay, Hudson County, New Jersey, if such location is declared to be not navigable waters of the United States by the Secretary of the Army. Stipulates that local interests shall reimburse the Federal Government for engineering and all other costs incurred under this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize certain filling and construction in a portion of Upper New York Bay, Hudson County, N.J.
